quest.name: Bloodlines
journal: Gibrillont has the look of a man weighing his words with the greatest of care.
We cannot escape the legacy left to us by our parents. The Mongrel and her pups have chosen to embrace that inescapable truth...but how can that information lead you to her?

Having discerned the purpose of Gibrillont's errands, you surmise that the Mongrel is none other than the raven-haired, ruby-eyed child born of the Elezen nobleman and the Hyuran woman. The reaction of the peasant you press for information serves to confirm your suspicions. Share your discovery with Alphinaud in the Forgotten Knight.
Though the whereabouts of the Mongrel are still unknown to you, Alphinaud feels confident that your newfound knowledge of her features will help greatly in your search.

dialogue.name: GIBRILLONT
dialogue.text: Some bonds are thicker than blood...but blood still defines us─and divides us in the end.

dialogue.name: GIBRILLONT
dialogue.text: It's the legacy of our parents, Forename, and we can't escape it, no matter how hard we try.

dialogue.name: GIBRILLONT
dialogue.text: So the Mongrel and her pups chose to embrace theirs─to proclaim it to all and sundry.

dialogue.name: GIBRILLONT
dialogue.text: If you can understand that, then maybe you can find her on your own.

dialogue.name: THEPOORA01996
dialogue.text: Still looking for your mongrel? Like I said before, take your pick. Plenty around, if you know where to look. Or did you fancy someone specific?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: I'm looking for a mongrel with ruby red eyes and raven black hair.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: I'm looking for a mongrel with raven black eyes and ruby red hair.

dialogue.name: THEPOORA01996
dialogue.text: Ho, someone's got unusual tastes. Afraid I can't help you, though.

dialogue.name: THEPOORA01996
dialogue.text: Won't, rather. It's bloody obvious you ain't of the Brume. Did you think I'd just tell you 'cause you asked nicely?

dialogue.name: THEPOORA01996
dialogue.text: What, coeurl got your tongue? Off you trot, then.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Have you made any progress, Forename?

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Hmm... So our mongrel was born of an Elezen nobleman and a Hyuran maidservant.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Granted, it is no location, but it is far more information than we had before. Yes...now that her striking features are known to us, mayhap we need only remain vigilant.
